```{r}
library(tidyverse)
url <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/welcho2020/tidyverse/main/hotels.csv'
hotels <- read_csv(url)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(hotel, lead_time)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(-agent)
```
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
url <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/welcho2020/tidyverse/main/hotels.csv'
hotels <- read_csv(url)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(hotel:arrival_date_month)
```
```{r}
hotels%>%
  select(starts_with("arrival"))
```
```{r}
hotels%>%
  select(ends_with("type"))
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(adults, children, babies) %>%
  arrange(babies)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  select(adults, children, babies) %>%
  arrange(desc(babies))
```
```{r}
# first five
hotels %>%
  slice(1:5)
```
```{r}
# bookings in City Hotels
hotels %>%
  filter(hotel == "City Hotel")
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  filter( 
    adults == 0,
    children >= 1
    ) %>% 
  select(adults, babies, children)
```
```{r}
# bookings with no adults and some children or babies in the room
hotels %>%
  filter( 
    adults == 0,     
    children >= 1 | babies >= 1     # | means or
    ) %>%
  select(adults, babies, children)
```
```{r}
hotels %>% 
  distinct(market_segment) %>%
  arrange(market_segment)
```
```{r}
hotels %>% 
  distinct(hotel, market_segment) %>%
  arrange(hotel, market_segment)
```
```{r}
# alphabetical order by default
hotels %>%
  count(market_segment)
```
```{r}
# descending frequency order
hotels %>%
  count(market_segment, sort = TRUE)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  count(market_segment) %>%
  arrange(n)
```
```{r}
# descending frequency order
# just like adding sort = TRUE
hotels %>%
  count(market_segment) %>%
  arrange(desc(n))
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  count(hotel, market_segment)
```
```{r}

# hotel type first
hotels %>%
  count(hotel, market_segment)
```
```{r}
# market segment first
hotels %>%
  count(market_segment, hotel)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  mutate(little_ones = children + babies) %>%
  select(children, babies, little_ones) %>%
  arrange(desc(little_ones))
```
```{r}
# Resort Hotel
hotels %>%
  mutate(little_ones = children + babies) %>%
  filter(
    little_ones >= 1,
    hotel == "Resort Hotel"
    ) %>%
  select(hotel, little_ones)
```
```{r}
# City Hotel
hotels %>%
  mutate(little_ones = children + babies) %>%
  filter(
    little_ones >= 1,
    hotel == "City Hotel"
    )  %>%
  select(hotel, little_ones)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  mutate(little_ones = children + babies) %>%
  count(hotel, little_ones) %>%
  mutate(prop = n / sum(n))
```
```{r}
# mean average daily rate for all bookings
hotels %>%
  summarise(mean_adr = mean(adr))
```
```{r}
# mean average daily rate for all booking at city and resort hotels
hotels %>%
  group_by(hotel) %>%
  summarise(mean_adr = mean(adr))
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  group_by(hotel) %>%
  summarise(n = n())
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  count(hotel)
```
```{r}
hotels %>%
  summarise(
    min_adr = min(adr),
    mean_adr = mean(adr),
    median_adr = median(adr),
    max_adr = max(adr)
    )
```
